name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

keyEvents.title: Conclusion of Davy Back Fight
keyEvents.description: The final round of the Davy Back Fight concludes on Long Ring Long Land with Luffy's victory over Foxy.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Davy Back Fight arc and Foxy's 920-win streak.

keyEvents.title: Rittonto Emerges from Underground
keyEvents.description: Rittonto arrives on Long Ring Long Land by emerging from underground on his giant mole.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the unique geography of the island and sets up the reunion with Tonjit.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates leave Long Ring Long Land to continue their journey to find a shipwright.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes the Long Ring Long Land Arc and transitions the story to the next adventure.

geography: A unique archipelago consisting of ten islands connected in a ring shape, with sections that are submerged and revealed based on tidal patterns.
